comments.text:
on our corp. intranet when pages popup that use self.resizeTo() i get an exception (nothing else, everything works fine, just the errors filling up the JS console or firebug get annoying).

this is quite similar to bug 236791.

[Exception... "'Permission denied to get property XULElement.columns' when calling method: [nsIDOMXULTreeElement::columns]" nsresult: "0x8057001e (NS_ERROR_XPC_JS_THREW_STRING)" location: "JS frame :: http://*************************** :: resize_Window :: line 177" data: no]

Reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce:
window.open() a page that uses "self.resizeTo()"
Actual Results:  
Exception is thrown

Expected Results:  
No Exception
comments.author: mozilla@neongrau.de

comments.text:
Created attachment 228125
testcase to reproduce

simplified testcase. 100% reproducable.

comments.raw_text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1a3) Gecko/20060702 BonEcho/2.0a3
The whole window resizes so I can see my desktop (very annoying behaviour) and I see no error here.
In 1.5x I see that only the popup resizes but still no error. Also javascript.options.showInConsole is set to true. Are you sure you uploaded the right testcase?
comments.text:
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1a3) Gecko/20060702 BonEcho/2.0a3
The whole window resizes so I can see my desktop (very annoying behaviour) and I see no error here.
In 1.5x I see that only the popup resizes but still no error. Also javascript.options.showInConsole is set to true. Are you sure you uploaded the right testcase?

sorry my fault.

this seems only to happen when the firebug extension is running. and all machines that i used to verify my testcase had it installed as well.

the only extension i never disable (for obvious reasons) :S

i'll send a notice to the extension developer.
comments.author: mozilla@neongrau.de

The original summary for this bug was longer than 255 characters, and so it was truncated when Bugzilla was upgraded. The original summary was:

pages using "self.resizeTo()" and are opened via "window.open()" throw [Exception... "'Permission denied to get property XULElement.columns' when calling method: [nsIDOMXULTreeElement::columns]" nsresult: "0x8057001e (NS_ERROR_XPC_JS_THREW_STRING)" location: "JS frame :: http://*************************** :: resize_Window :: line 177" data: no]
